attributes.additional_details: Armed Officers could be miles away, this can't happen anymore. Arm all Police Officers in response to recent terror attacks and violent attacks against incocent members of the public.
attributes.background: Arm all Police Officers. There has been many attacks over recent months that could have ended if Police were armed.

rejection.details: The Government is responsible for setting the rules for who can use firearms, but decisions about training police officers in the use of firearms and arming them is an operational decision for individual police forces, not the UK Parliament and Government.
